alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 29 at 10:20PM CST until November 30 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CST FOR EASTERN SIMPSON...SOUTHWESTERN SMITH...NORTHEASTERN LAWRENCE...NORTHWESTERN COVINGTON AND NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 1020 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Clem, or near Magee, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Magee, Mount Olive and Sanatorium around 1030 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include New Hebron. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
